page.title: 01A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Most children usually get up at 7-8 o'clock in the morning.Then they get dressed.Breakfast takes quarter of an hour. The average time it takes to walk to school is under 10 minutes.Many children come to school by bus.Their journey takes up to 1hour.When we get to school,boys play football and girls talk.We start school at 9:00. In the morning we do Maths and English.We then have a break from 10:35 to 10:50am.Next we have lunch at 12:00 to 1:05pm.In the afternoon we do Music,P.E.,Games, History,Geography,Topic,Art,Reading and finishing off work.Break is at 2:15 to 2:30.School finishes at 3:25 for Juniors and 3:15 for Infants. After school, we go down town with some friends.Then they go back home.We have tea at 6-o'clock, bed at 9:00pm.
